import React from 'react'; import "materialize-css/dist/css/materialize.min.css"; import "materialize-css/dist/js/materialize.min.js"; import M from "materialize-css"; class Rough extends React.Component{ componentDidMount(){ M.Datepicker.init(this.Datepicker1, { format: " dd/mm/yyyy " }); M.Datepicker.init(this.Datepicker2, { format: " dd/mm/yyyy " }); } constructor(props){ super(props) this.state={ dep:'', arr:'', flight_num:'', length:'', index:'', data:[], submitted:'false', } } onSubmitHandler=(event)=>{ console.log(event.currentTarget.innerHTML); let data=event.currentTarget.innerHTML; let val=data.split(''); console.log(val); for(let i=1;i"); this.state.data.push(val1[0]); } this.state.data.push(this.props.location.state.arr1[0].pass_num); this.state.data.push(this.props.location.state.arr1[0].din); console.log(this.state.data); this.setState({submitted:'true'}) } redirect=()=>{ const arr=this.state.data; this.props.history.push('/Payment',{arr}); } render(){ if(this.state.submitted==='true'){ {this.redirect()} } return(
